meanings.definition: Theocentrism: the belief that God is the central focus of all things.
meanings.sent1: In theocentrism, God is seen as the most important.
meanings.sent2: Many people find comfort in theocentrism, knowing that God is at the center of everything.
meanings.sent3: Theocentrism makes me think of God sitting on a throne in the middle of the universe.
meanings.sent4: Her theocentrism shines like a beacon in a dark world.
meanings.sent5: Theocentrism paints a picture of a divine presence guiding every step.

meanings.definition: Theocentrism: a worldview that places God at the center of human existence.
meanings.sent1: Theocentrism emphasizes the importance of God in our lives.
meanings.sent2: For those who follow theocentrism, God is the core of their existence.
meanings.sent3: I like to imagine theocentrism as a big hug from God around the world.
meanings.sent4: His theocentrism is like a lighthouse guiding ships to safety.
meanings.sent5: Theocentrism is like a warm blanket of faith on a cold night.
